title: Ugandan chocolatier keeps Valentine's Day lovers sweet
text:
Ugandan chocolatier keeps Valentine's Day lovers sweet 11:16am EST - 01:41 
Ugandan chocolatier Stephen Sembuya expects a boost in sales this Valentine’s Day. The CEO of Pink Foods Industries is creating personalised chocolate bars to keep customers sweet. As Laura Frykberg reports, the company is paving the way in Uganda, by producing its own chocolate from the beans it grows.
